tool_description: An API to extract content from any web page as JSON. Get the title, description, open graph, embed content or any other information available at a given public URL.
name: Page.REST
title: Page.REST

api_list.name: Fetch
api_list.description: Fetches details from a web page given by the URL

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Give the URL of the page you want to fetch

optional_parameters.name: selector
optional_parameters.description: A valid CSS selector to extract element(s) from the page (You can provide multiple selectors, up to 10)

optional_parameters.name: og
optional_parameters.description: Set this param if you want the response to include OpenGraph data from the page

optional_parameters.name: header
optional_parameters.description: An HTTP response header value to return from the response (You can provide multiple selectors, up to 10)

optional_parameters.name: prerender
optional_parameters.description: Set this param if you want the page to be pre-rendered (usually this is needed for pages that are client-side rendered, for example if the site uses React)

optional_parameters.name: contains
optional_parameters.description: Provide a valid JS regex (or simply a string) to see if a pattern matching it exists in the page's text.

optional_parameters.name: embed
optional_parameters.description: Set this param if you want the response to include oEmbed content from the page
